IndicatorDefinition.name: IndicatorDefinition
IndicatorDefinition.description: Represents information about the indicator assignment and the process of measuring and calculating the indicator results.

Description.description: The description of the indicator definition.

FlowDefinitionApiName.description: The API name of the flow definition associated with the indicator definition. This field is available from API version 60.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when a user last referenced this indicator definition.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when a user last viewed this indicator definition.

Name.description: The name of the indicator definition.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the outcome.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the indicator definition.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the target, baseline, and result values that are associated with this indicator definition.
